title: Dana White on UFC at the White House, Future of Boxing
description: Dana White, UFC President, CEO and Co-Owner, discusses the UFC’s deal with Paramount, a potential White House event, and the future of boxing with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Dana White, UFC President, CEO and Co-Owner, discusses the UFC’s deal with Paramount, a potential White House event, and the future of boxing with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
